tool.name: ClosestBed

param.name: inputB
param.label: overlap intervals in this BED/VCF/GFF file?

param.name: ties
param.label: How ties for closest feature should be handled
param.help: This occurs when two features in B have exactly the same overlap with a feature in A.
param.option: first - Report the first tie that occurred in the B file
last - Report the last tie that occurred in the B file

param.name: addition
param.label: In addition to the closest feature in B, report its distance to A as an extra column
param.help: The reported distance for overlapping features will be 0
